Uses of Package
org.torrent.coredata

Packages that use org.torrent.coredata 
Package Description
org.torrent.bencoding
Contains the class for parsing a Bencoded file and also the class for representing a parsed torrent file
org.torrent.coredata
Contains all the classes needed for managing the data during the lifetime of a download
org.torrent.nio
Contains a fa√ßade class for interacting with the client and the main class that handles non-blocking IO operations
  • Classes in org.torrent.coredata used by org.torrent.bencoding 
    Class Description
    ChannelData
    This class holds information about the state of a channel, including information such as whether it is working on a piece, whether it is being choked and messages it needs to send
    FlowControls.TorrentStatus
    A series of statuses used in code control statements within NIOThread.

    A series of statuses used in code control statements within NIOThread.

    A series of statuses used in code control statements within NIOThread.
    Peer
    This class represents information about Peers that the client may connect to
    PiecePicker
    An abstract class for subclassing.
